name: Mechanic Heroes
description:
Mechanic Heroes is a co-operative chaotic action game for one to four players. As newly certified mechanics, you and your crew must repair as many cars as possible before the end of the shift.

Take part in a heroic journey and complete tasks in challenging and hazardous environments which will push your skills of co-ordination to the maximum. Each level brings a new challenge for you and your team to overcome, whether it is to change batteries in wet conditions, keep cars clean in muddy environments, or drive in congested places.

You’ll need to work together to get the highest score in local and online multiplayer. As you play through the game you'll unlock new levels, new fashionable characters, glorious cars and even competitive levels which allow players to race against each other.

KEY FEATURES

  • Play with up to 4 friends locally or online.
  • Repair cars in various, yet unusual and hazardous environments.
  • Complete various tasks like changing flat tires, cleaning cars, or recharging batteries.
  • Master your driving skills in improvised congested garages.
  • Comical physics-based gameplay where you can throw stuff across the level to save time.
  • Over 25 levels to discover and master.
  • Play against your friends in a competitive race mode.
  • Unlock fashionable characters and famous cars.
